Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 85th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1966...
Injured on 6/16/1966 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/19/1969 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for 6 days...
Released by New York (N) on 6/16/1969...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 3/1/1970 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 9/6/1970 with a Bruised Hip, out for 6 days...
Drafted in 6th round, 112nd overall pick, by Baltimore in 1978...
Injured on 6/8/1981 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
